description.value:
This ability is for a Shadow Familiar. A @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Shadowcaster Dedication]{Shadowcaster}, however, can select this ability for any kind of familiar. Your familiar gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Shadow Step]{Shadow Step} action.

You must be at least 7th level to select this familiar ability for your familiar.
